services package

Submodules

services.sales_service module

services.sales_service.add_sale(data)[source]

Add a new sales record to the database.

Parameters:

data (dict) – A dictionary containing the sales details, including: - “customer_id” (int): The ID of the customer making the purchase. - “product_id” (int): The ID of the product being purchased. - “quantity” (int): The quantity of the product purchased.

Returns:

The newly created Sales object.

Return type:

Sales
